price: እናንተ የመጽሐፉ ሰዎች ሆይ! በኢብራሂም ለምን ትከራከራላችሁ ተውራትና ኢንጂልም ከርሱ በኋላ እንጅ አልተወረዱም፡፡ ልብ አታደርጉምን በላቸው፡፡
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تُحَآجُّونَ فِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَتِ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةُ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلُ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima tuḥājjūna fī ib'rāhīma wamā unzilati al-tawrātu wal-injīlu illā min baʿdihi afalā taʿqilūna
